#summary The navigator.language property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `navigator.language` property returns a string.
  * [BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] returns your browser language and country code.  Example: `"en-US"`
  * [BrowserFamilySafari Safari] returns your browser language.  Example: `"en"`
  * [BrowserFamilyOpera Opera] returns your browser language.  Example: `"en"`

This property is read-only.
